tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LessonProgress (
  user_id INT,
  lesson_id INT,
  completed BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserProgress(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (lesson_id) REFERENCES ARTrainingLessons(lesson_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserPerformance (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id INT,
 module_id INT,
 accuracy FLOAT,
 time_spent INT
);
